🌐 SMELLS FANTASTIC - Use it once and you'll never go back. Cleans well, smells even better. We have a full range of delicious soaps for you to try.
🌐 PH BALANCED - Our full range of Yoni Soap Bars for Women is designed with pH balance in mind. Use with confidence as it enhances your natural pH to prevent irritation and bad bacteria.

🌐 SATISFACTION GUARANTEED - We know you will love our Fidelis Yoni Soap bar for women. But if you are not 100% satisfied, reach out to us and We'll Make it Right or Your Money Back. Why wait? Get it now risk free!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is my favorite Yoni
reviews.reviewText: This soap is magical, removes all odors,restores ph instantly.. I love this one and keep rebuying

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Don’t ever make reviews cause I’m lazy BUT
reviews.reviewText: This might be VERY TMI. But if it can help someone else w the same problem, so be it. I have thick thighs and I started to go to the gym 5-7 times a week. It’s also been very hot lately since it was summer So it’s easy for me to sweat between my legs very often and as we all know bacteria love wet and damp places so unfortunately it’s easy for me to have the same musty smell you would usually get under your armpits. I would use all kinds of soaps, I would shower 2-3 times a day ( I even contemplated using deodorant down there but I heard it’s bad for u but I was so desperate I was willing to try ANYTHING) and when I would go to put clothes on, it’s almost as if the smell lingered and I never showered in the first place . This would obviously upset me so much as I am such a clean person and always try to take care of myself in all aspects. This wasn’t a smell that would come from the inside of my … for lack of a better term, hoohaa. Just an FYI I was cleared from any infections as I went to the doctors and had no STD’s, yeast infections, BV, Vaginitis etc, I know those cause smells but I didn’t have anything. But rather it was coming from the space between my inner thigh and outer labia. AGAIN sorry for TMI. But how embarrassing would it be to have a future partner go down there and smell that when yk you’ve showered right before????In my desperation, I looked up hacks for better hygienic methods to take care of the issue and came across “YONI” bar. I’ve never heard about a ph balance soap till this week and after reading some reviews, I figured I’d say f it. Soon as it came in I showered w it and the smell was GONE. I definitely sweat in my sleep and go to the bathroom when I wake up and again, SAME smell. It’s not awful but having a slightly musty smell isn’t the best feeling when you know you’ve showered prior to taking a nap. I slept 8 hrs, and I am so so so pleased/relieved that the mustiness that once bothered me is now gone. I will update when I go to the gym, and in a couple days as well. But so far I am ECSTATIC 🥹

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars smells so good
reviews.reviewText: it works all day and smells good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: When you use this on your skin it makes it feel off brandish if you know what i mean .... i dont use it all over often. But it do smell amazing the bar is square n thick but it definitely dwindles in size fast so quality would be a 3star instead of 5

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not for sensitive areas!
reviews.reviewText: I do not recommend using this on your lady bits! It was fine during the wash and the sent is lovely. However, the positives end there. I noticed tenderness afterwards then a day later irritated skin that created an unusual discharge. I thought I may have developed a yeast infection after googling my symptoms but the test was negative and the irritation remains. I have an appointment with my doctor to hopefully get some relief but it has been very unpleasant and I seriously regret using this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The soap had lather but unfortunately I really couldn’t smell the peachy. Peachy where ? Very disappointing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Finally something that gets rid of fishussy smell
reviews.reviewText: No one warned me what a big issue smell would be down. I've been up and down products to control my smell down there. I've been so embarrassed that I avoid using the bathrooms at work in fear of offending. No matter how many times I was with "ph" soap, i'm just immediately smelly after cleaning.This has been a life saver. It's been two days and yes there's still usual intimate smell but its not rank od fushussy at all. Its normalussy smell. Thank you so much, this product has likely saved years off my kidneys. I can finally go to public bathrooms instead of holding it in.its a bit pricey for 2 small bars of soap BUT its not pricey at all compared to other yoni bars on this site. actually quite a steal for someone like me whose been at wits end trying to find something that works for the fishussy smell.I will be buying more in other scents to see which I like better. Peach smells like real peach with some chemical to it, but I'd rather that than fishussy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Smell and lather really well, that's it.
